label: Convoy
comment: A number of means of transport following each other with a common transport purpose.

datatypeProperties.comment: The overall length measure of this logistics convoy.
The maximum width measure for this logistics convoy.
The number of means of transport in this logistics convoy.

objectProperties.comment: A means of transport not actively powering this logistics convoy.
A means of transport actively powering this logistics convoy.

referencedBy.comment: The convoy associated with this logistics transport movement.
